{{title|operator{{==}}{{dsc small|(std::layout_stride::mapping)}}}}
{{cpp/container/mdspan/layout_stride/mapping/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++23|1=
template&lt; class OtherMapping &gt;
friend constexpr bool operator==( const mapping&amp; lhs, 
                                  const OtherMapping&amp; rhs ) noexcept;
}}
Compares two layout mappings of possibly different layout types based on their underlying extents and strides. 

Layout mappings {{c|lhs}} and {{c|rhs}} compare equal if all of the following conditions are {{c|true}}:
* both {{c|lhs.extents()}} and {{c|rhs.extents()}} are equal,
* {{c|OFFSET(rhs)}} is equal to {{c|0}}, and
* for every rank index {{c|r}} in the range {{range|0|lhs.extents().rank()}}, {{c|lhs.stride(r)}} is equal to {{c|rhs.stride(r)}}
Where {{c|OFFSET(rhs)}} is equal to:
* {{c|rhs()}}, if {{c|rhs.extents().rank()}} is {{c|0}},
* otherwise {{c|0}}, if the size of the multidimensional index space {{c|rhs.extents()}} is {{c|0}},
* otherwise {{c|rhs(z...)}} for a pack of integers {{c|z}} that is a multidimensional index in {{c|rhs.extents()}} and each element of {{c|z}} is equal to {{c|0}}.

{{cpp/enable_if|1=all of the following constraints are satisfied:
* {{box/core|{{lti|cpp/named_req/LayoutMapping#layout-mapping-alike|layout-mapping-alike}}{{nbsp|1}}{{c/core|&lt;OtherMapping&gt;}}}} is satisfied,
* {{c|1=rank_ == OtherMapping::extents_type::rank()}} is {{c|true}}, and
* {{c|OtherMapping::is_always_strided()}} is {{c|true}} 
}}
{{petty|({{lti|cpp/container/mdspan/layout_stride/mapping#Member constants|rank_}} is an exposition-only static member constant defined in {{c/core|std::layout_stride::mapping}}.)}}

If {{tt|OtherMapping}} does not meet the {{named req|LayoutMapping}} requirements, the behavior is undefined.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|lhs, rhs|layout mappings whose extents and strides to compare}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{c|true}} if {{c|lhs}} and {{c|rhs}} are both equal as specified above, {{c|false}} otherwise
